name: CervicalCytology_HD_HCPCS
title: Cervical Cytology_HD_HCPCS
description: b.well created value set by Sr. Clinical Business Analyst for Cervical Cytology.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The intent of this value set is for the purpose of defining the clinical codes that constitute Cervical Cytology for inclusion and utilization in patients/users connected heath.),(Data Element Scope: Cervical Cytology for b.well.),(Inclusion Criteria: Cervical Cytology Codes that constitute a Cancer Care Need for b.well.),(Exclusion Criteria: N/A)
